Structure# IODisplayModeInformation

Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+

```
typedef struct IODisplayModeInformation {
    ...
} IODisplayModeInformation;
```

## [Topics](/documentation/iokit/iodisplaymodeinformation#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/iokit/iodisplaymodeinformation#2862767)

[`flags`](/documentation/iokit/iodisplaymodeinformation/1505482-flags)Flags for a display mode.[`imageHeight`](/documentation/iokit/iodisplaymodeinformation/1505901-imageheight)Physical height of active image if known, in millimeters, otherwise zero.[`imageWidth`](/documentation/iokit/iodisplaymodeinformation/1506007-imagewidth)Physical width of active image if known, in millimeters, otherwise zero.[`maxDepthIndex`](/documentation/iokit/iodisplaymodeinformation/1505323-maxdepthindex)Highest depth index available in this display mode.[`nominalHeight`](/documentation/iokit/iodisplaymodeinformation/1505238-nominalheight)Number of visible pixel rows.[`nominalWidth`](/documentation/iokit/iodisplaymodeinformation/1506031-nominalwidth)Number of pixels visible per row.[`refreshRate`](/documentation/iokit/iodisplaymodeinformation/1506012-refreshrate)Refresh rate in fixed point 16.16.[`reserved`](/documentation/iokit/iodisplaymodeinformation/1505975-reserved)Set to zero.
